thread.title: Johan Cruyff Diagnosed With Lung Cancer
thread.title_full: Johan Cruyff Diagnosed With Lung Cancer

title: Johan Cruyff Diagnosed With Lung Cancer
text:
Johan Cruyff Diagnosed With Lung Cancer 09:59, UK, Thursday 22 October 2015 Share by email Legendary Dutch former player and manager Johan Cruyff has been diagnosed with lung cancer, according to Spanish media. 
It is understood Cruyff, who won three consecutive European Cups and three Ballon d'Or awards during his time with Ajax in the 1970s, has undergone tests to establish the extent of the disease. 
Cruyff, who also played for and managed Barcelona, underwent double heart bypass surgery in 1991. 
Sky Sports has learned that a statement is being issued on the Johan Cruyff Foundation website later this morning. 
More to follow.
